domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies

text:
8- Spraying alcohol or chlorine all over your body will not kill viruses that have already entered your body

9- Can pets at home spread it?
Currently, there is no evidence to suggest it. However, it is always a good idea to wash your hands with soap and water.
